channel.title: GER:ENR on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GER:ENR on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Siemens Energy to Hit Top End of Guidance With US Demand Strong
item.description: Siemens Energy AG expects to reach the upper end of its full-year guidance on the back of surging orders for its gas turbines and grid equipment amid a boom in global electricity demand.
